comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Goggles, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 25695066@N00
comment._content: After resigning his commission in 1922, Reuben H. Fleet would go on to establish Consolidated Aircraft.  Consolidated is most famous for building the PBY Catalina and B-24 Liberator.

comment.author: 43141076@N04
comment._content: What a great historical photo, thanks for sharing! ~ Reuben H. Fleet Science Center, San Diego CA. www.rhfleet.org
